name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Back-end Programmer with 10+ years of experience in developing robust software solutions. Proficient in **PHP**, **SQL**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and skilled in **APIs** design and integration. Strong understanding of **Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)**, **SOLID principles**, and **Design Patterns**, ensuring high-quality code maintenance and clarity. Experienced in **Version Control** and applying **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** and **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)** for effective software design. Proven ability to implement **Clean Architectures** to enhance scalability and maintainability of applications.

Well-versed in building and deploying applications on cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS** with a focus on performance and security. Recognized for utilizing effective analytical and organizational skills, fostering teamwork through a proactive attitude and a good sense of humor. Known for leading cross-functional teams to deliver projects that create meaningful impacts in healthcare and finance sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and developed back-end solutions in **PHP** and **SQL** following **OOP**, **SOLID**, and **Design Patterns**, ensuring clean architecture and maintainable codebase.
• Implemented robust RESTful **APIs** for seamless integration with front-end systems, optimizing performance and reliability.
• Conducted **TDD** practices, employing unit and integration testing strategies to ensure code quality and functionality across all development stages.
• Leveraged version control systems like Git, establishing workflows that promote collaboration and effective project management among team members.
• Developed user-centric features using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, focusing on enhancing the user experience within **WordPress** environments.
• Led initiatives employing **DDD** principles to align software design with business objectives, promoting a clear understanding of domain logic.
• Fostered strong teamwork and collaboration within the engineering team, emphasizing clear communication and a proactive attitude towards problem-solving.
• Contributed to project documentation and knowledge sharing, enhancing organizational skills and improving project transparency and workflow efficiency.
• Recognized for maintaining a good sense of humor, promoting a positive work environment while delivering high-quality back-end solutions.

- Developed and maintained APIs to facilitate seamless data exchange between front-end applications and financial platforms, utilizing **PHP** and **SQL** for robust functionality.
- Employed Object-Oriented Programming (**OOP**), following **SOLID** principles and **Design Patterns** to create scalable and maintainable codebases, enhancing team productivity by **30%**.
- Implemented **Version Control** practices using Git to manage code changes efficiently, improving collaboration and tracking versions effectively across the development team.
- Conducted comprehensive testing (including **TDD** and **DDD**) to ensure robust application stability and performance, resulting in a **25%** decrease in production bugs.
- Optimized front-end performance through effective use of **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, enhancing user experience in financial applications.
- Integrated with WordPress for content management functionalities across platforms, supporting dynamic web applications to meet client needs.
- Utilized strong analytical skills to troubleshoot and debug code, proactively addressing issues before they escalated, fostering a culture of **proactive attitude** and **good humor** within the team.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure cohesive project execution, leveraging **teamwork** to achieve project milestones and deadlines successfully.

Developed high-quality, maintainable code for backend services utilizing **PHP** while adhering to **SOLID** principles and **Design Patterns** to ensure code reliability and scalability.
Implemented effective **APIs** for seamless integration with frontend systems, optimizing interactions and data flow while ensuring strong version control practices using **Git**.
Designed and maintained relational databases utilizing **SQL**, ensuring efficient data retrieval and storage for dynamic content through well-structured queries and properly normalized tables.
Employed **TDD** and **DDD** methodologies to enhance software design and support rigorous testing frameworks, improving overall product quality by achieving over **85% code coverage**.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, leveraging strong **Organizational Skills** and **Proactive Attitude** to drive project timelines and deliver functionality that met user requirements.
Participated in team code reviews and mentorship sessions, fostering a culture of teamwork and **Good Humor**, while promoting best practices in coding and development processes.
Built responsive user interfaces with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, enhancing customer engagement and optimizing performance metrics, achieving a page load time reduction of **30%**.
Utilized **WordPress** for content-managed sites, streamlining setups for e-commerce solutions and increasing site deployment speed by **40%**.
Applied **OOP** principles in all development tasks to maintain well-structured and extensible codebases, resulting in reduced bug rates and enhanced maintenance efficiency.
